de.simonschuler.ba.client

Interface Client

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientService

    public interface Client
    interface for communication with the blockchain node

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getAuthorisedAddresses(ServerCallback callback)
      get all addresses that have access to your data
      void getData(ServerCallback callback)
      retrieve data from the blockchain
      void grantAccess(AccessManagementObject access, ServerCallback callback)
      grant a user access to your data
      void removeAccess(AccessManagementObject access, ServerCallback callback)
      remove access to your data from a user
      void storeData(DriverData data, ServerCallback callback)
      send data to be stored on the blockchain

    • Method Detail

      • storeData

        void storeData(DriverData data,
               ServerCallback callback)
        send data to be stored on the blockchain
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be stored
        callback - callback to get response

      • getData

        void getData(ServerCallback callback)
        retrieve data from the blockchain
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to get data, callback returns DriverData

      • grantAccess

        void grantAccess(AccessManagementObject access,
                 ServerCallback callback)
        grant a user access to your data
        Parameters:
        access - object that holds information on access management
        callback - callback to get response

      • removeAccess

        void removeAccess(AccessManagementObject access,
                  ServerCallback callback)
        remove access to your data from a user
        Parameters:
        access - object that holds information on access management
        callback - callback to get response

      • getAuthorisedAddresses

        void getAuthorisedAddresses(ServerCallback callback)
        get all addresses that have access to your data
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to get response, callback returns AccessManagementObject
